action.action-desc: Mr. Duffy introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to reduce compliance burdens on certain banking entities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Regional Financial Relief Act of 2014.

section.header: Distinct and less burdensome requirements for certain banking entities
section.text: Paragraph (1) of section 13(e) of the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 (12 U.S.C. 1851(e)(1)) is amended by adding at the end the following: Such regulations shall include distinct requirements for banking entities with less than $50,000,000,000 in trading assets and liabilities that are less burdensome than the requirements for banking entities with $50,000,000,000 or more in trading assets and liabilities.
